headline: Vistra Expands Gas Fleet With $4 Billion Cogentrix Acquisition
summary: Vistra has agreed to acquire the Cogentrix Energy gas-fired generation portfolio, adding nearly 5.5 GW of capacity across major U.S. power markets.

content.title: Vistra Expands Gas Fleet With $4 Billion Cogentrix Acquisition
content.summary: Vistra has agreed to acquire the Cogentrix Energy gas-fired generation portfolio, adding nearly 5.5 GW of capacity across major U.S. power markets.

headline: Vistra to buy Cogentrix Energy in $4.7bn cash-and-stock deal
summary: The company will expand its US generation capacity through the acquisition of ten Cogentrix gas plants across major regional markets.

content.title: Vistra to buy Cogentrix Energy in $4.7bn cash-and-stock deal
content.summary: The company will expand its US generation capacity through the acquisition of ten Cogentrix gas plants across major regional markets.

thumbnail.caption: Vistra expects the addition of the ten facilities to expand its total generation capacity to nearly 50GW across the US. Credit: T. Schneider/Shutterstock.com.

headline: Is It Time To Reassess Vistra (VST) After Its Strong Multi Year Rally?
summary: If you have been wondering whether Vistra shares still offer value at around US$162.93, this article will walk through what the current price might mean for you as an investor. The stock has moved only slightly in the short term, with a 0.2% gain over the last 7 days, a 2.5% decline over 30 days, and a 1.4% decline year to date. The 1 year return sits at 0.3%, and the 3 and 5 year returns are very large, around 7x and higher. Recent attention on Vistra has been shaped by news around the...
